title: 你希望后面的版本能出什么令你期待的东西呢
txt_content: 比如说刷怪蛋，还有装备啊啥的，反正我最期望的就是能出黑曜石稿子挖基岩做基岩套装和基岩工具基岩剑啥的[bedrock][minecart][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][rail_corner4][rail_corner2][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][powered_rail1][flint_and_steel][TNT]
